1. Instruction about Environment and Configuration
    (1) jdk version: jdk 1.8
    (2) run "java HW2MainLucene" then "java HW3Main" in terminal or run in IDEA

3. Tuning µ
    Here is rank lists in different µ from 1000 to 3000 (500 a step), the ranking of top 20 document changes, but most of them still in the top list within less position changes.
    I pick first 3 document using short query and long query. smoothing value if smaller when searching by longer query.
    for a fixed μ longer documents will get less smoothing. µ is weighting the P(w | REF) in LM, it is not very sensitive for short query. As μ gets large, all term weights tend to zero.
    However, the optimal value of µ does not seem to be much different for title queries and long queries (Cite: Zhai, Chengxiang, and John Lafferty. “A Study of Smoothing Methods for Language Models Applied to Ad Hoc Information Retrieval.” Proceedings of the 24th Annual International ACM SIGIR Conference on Research and Development in Information Retrieval. ACM, 2001. 334–342. Web.)

    Q0 title only: 901 hong kong econom singapor
